section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In the second case, Number 1455, United States against Gillock for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court filed with the Clerk this morning.
The judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit is reversed.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist, with whom Mr. Justice Powell joined, filed a dissenting statement.
